name: XamariniOS
description: Build an iOS app with Xamarin on macOS
helpMarkDown: [Learn more about this task](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=613729) or [see the Xamarin iOS documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/xamarin/ios/)
author: Microsoft Corporation
releaseNotes: iOS signing set up has been removed from the task. Use `Secure Files` with supporting tasks `Install Apple Certificate` and `Install Apple Provisioning Profile` to setup signing. Updated options to work better with `Visual Studio for Mac`.

inputs.name: solution
inputs.label: Solution
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repository root of the Xamarin.iOS solution to build. May contain wildcards.

inputs.name: configuration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Standard configurations are Ad-Hoc, AppStore, Debug, Release.

inputs.name: clean
inputs.label: Clean
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run a clean build (/t:clean) prior to the build.

inputs.name: packageApp
inputs.label: Create app package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether an IPA should be generated as a part of the build.

inputs.name: forSimulator
inputs.label: Build for iOS Simulator
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally build for the iOS Simulator instead of physical iOS devices.

inputs.name: runNugetRestore
inputs.label: Run NuGet restore
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally run `nuget restore` on the Xamarin iOS solution to install all referenced packages before build. The 'nuget' tool in the PATH of the build agent machine will be used. To use a different version of NuGet or set additional arguments, use the [NuGet Tool Installer](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852538) task.

inputs.name: args
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional command line arguments that should be used to build.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory in which builds will run. When empty, the root of the repository is used.

inputs.name: buildToolLocation
inputs.label: Build tool path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the full path to MSBuild (the Visual Studio for Mac build tool). When empty, the default MSBuild path is used.

inputs.name: iosSigningIdentity
inputs.label: Signing identity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally override the signing identity that will be used to sign the build. If nothing is entered, the setting in the project will be used.

inputs.name: provProfileUuid
inputs.label: Provisioning profile UUID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional UUID of an installed provisioning profile to be used for this build.
